Contact Us

Hours Of Operation

Our operation hours are between Monday and Saturday from 8:00 am – 5:00 pm (EAT). Please note that form submissions made outside of working hours will be replied to on the next working days.

Email

For enquiries or bookings, write to info@bammtours.co.ke. We’ll revert within 20 minutes during business hours.

Call & WhatsApp

Our Locations

Head Office: Nairobi

Carman Showroom, a few meters from AAR Hospital, Ridgeways, Kiambu Road, Suite 05, Ground Floor.

Mombasa Office

Epic Business Park, 3rd Floor, Office A33, Links Road, Nyali, Mombasa County.

Nakuru Office

Kang’ei & Nyakinyua Building, Kenyatta Avenue, Opposite Nyayo Gardens, First floor Room 9.

Eldoret Office

Epic Business Park, 3rd Floor, Office A33, Links Road, Eldoret Town.

Visit Our Nairobi Head Office

BAMM > Blissful, Awesome & Magical Moments!

Thank you for visiting the Bamm Tours car hire website. We look forward to helping you explore Kenya and make the most of your trip. Hire a car with us and let’s help you create; Blissful, Awesome & Magical Moments!
